content: cmake required version: it is 3.24. Made a run using 3.23, doesn't work. So, we need to enforce cmake to be >= 3.24, but only on platforms using wxw3.2. Keeping this, the older linuxes we build for which does not have a recent enough cmake should be fine anyway.
A message was moved here from #Master - 5.8.0 (was: comms) > misc by Alec Leamas.
